amendment.description: To require the Administrator of the Federal Emergency Management Agency to issue guidelines for methods, other than building elevation, that owners of certain urban residential buildings may implement to mitigate against flood risk.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2708 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2708 proposed by Senator Gillibrand.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2708 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2708 proposed by Senator Gillibrand.
